amendment.description: Amendment provides an additional $10 million for Defense Health Program's research and development to address breast cancer in the United States military.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 13 printed in House Report 113-170 to increase the Defense Health Program's Research and Development account by $10 million and reduces the Defense Procurement-Wide account by the same amount.

action.text: Amendment (A011) offered by Ms. Jackson Lee.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson Lee amendment (A011) Agreed to by voice vote.
